Hey Kristin,

I am working with a Spirit using the recorder on my laptop.

=
He is able to form a few words without the use of white noise.

I asked him=
 yesterday if they eat and drink.

He said... Yes...we...and ran out of ste=
am...but it is very easy for him to blow the words hello into the mic on my=
 computer. So we use hello as an affirmative sometimes.

From what he has t=
old me, they do eat and drink. Which is what matches other material I have =
read.

Blessings,

Jeremy
New York, New York


From: EVP-ITC@...=
m 
Sent: Monday, April 14, 2008 1:13 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
Subjec=
t: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC



Hello,

This email message is =
a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files a=
rea of the EVP-ITC 
group.

File : /Kristin's Files/can u eat&drink YES yes=
 dr pep COKE COLA cleaned.wav 
Uploaded by : nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@sbcgloba=
l.net> 
Description : I was pouring a soda (Dr.P) and I asked if they could=
 eat or drink and heard YES (I CAN) and i repeated it back. I asked Dr. Pep=
per? and the replied COKE (COLA). items in parens is tough to hear. 

You c=
an access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files=
/Kristin%27s%20Files/can%20u%20eat%26drink%20YES%20yes%20%20dr%20pep%20COKE=
%20COLA%20cleaned.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, pl=
ease visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/in=
dex.htmlfiles

Regards,

nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...>
